name: The Suddenly Discovered Legacy of Your Nearly Forgotten And Recently Deceased Uncle
name_original: The Suddenly Discovered Legacy of Your Nearly Forgotten And Recently Deceased Uncle
description:
Once you discover your nearly forgotten uncle passed away and left you a mansion on the other side of the country in his last will, you go on a journey to explore the original home of your family that you have never chance to meet. What happened in the past, why did your mother never introduce you to your grandparents and what mysteries is the family mansion hiding? The game is a top-down walking simulator presenting an intricate family story in an unusual graphics style.

Controls
  • Use WSAD / Arrows to move around
  • Use the mouse to look around
  • Use F or Left Mouse Button to turn on the flashlight
  • Use E or Right Mouse Button to interact
